entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:56 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
